Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS
REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Relates to the regulation of cannabinoid hemp products
Summary: Provides that a retailer licensed by the office of cannabis management shall be permitted to sell any and all forms of cannabinoid hemp.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the cannabis law, in relation to the sale of cannabinoid hemp products; and directing the office of cannabis management to repeal certain emergency regulations
